SELECT SUM(CREAT_CO) AS statsCo
, SUBSTR(OCCRRNC_DE, 1, 4) AS statsDate
, CONCAT(CONCAT(SUBSTR(OCCRRNC_DE, 1, 4), '-'), SUBSTR(OCCRRNC_DE, 5, 2)) AS statsDate
, CONCAT(CONCAT(CONCAT(CONCAT(SUBSTR(OCCRRNC_DE, 1, 4), '-'), SUBSTR(OCCRRNC_DE, 5, 2)), '-'), SUBSTR(OCCRRNC_DE, 7, 2)) AS statsDate
FROM COMTSBBSSUMMARY WHERE 1 = 1
AND OCCRRNC_DE BETWEEN #fromDate# AND #toDate# AND STATS_SE = #statsKind#
AND DETAIL_STATS_SE = #detailStatsKind#
GROUP BY statsDate

SELECT SUM(TOT_RDCNT) AS statsCo
, SUBSTR(OCCRRNC_DE, 1, 4) AS statsDate
, CONCAT(CONCAT(SUBSTR(OCCRRNC_DE, 1, 4), '-'), SUBSTR(OCCRRNC_DE, 5, 2)) AS statsDate
, CONCAT(CONCAT(CONCAT(CONCAT(SUBSTR(OCCRRNC_DE, 1, 4), '-'), SUBSTR(OCCRRNC_DE, 5, 2)), '-'), SUBSTR(OCCRRNC_DE, 7, 2)) AS statsDate
FROM COMTSBBSSUMMARY WHERE 1 = 1
AND OCCRRNC_DE BETWEEN #fromDate# AND #toDate# AND STATS_SE = #statsKind#
AND DETAIL_STATS_SE = #detailStatsKind#
GROUP BY statsDate ORDER BY statsDate

SELECT IFNULL(SUM(TOT_RDCNT) / SUM(CREAT_CO), 0) AS avrgInqireCo
, SUBSTR(OCCRRNC_DE, 1, 4) AS statsDate
, CONCAT(CONCAT(SUBSTR(OCCRRNC_DE, 1, 4), '-'), SUBSTR(OCCRRNC_DE, 5, 2)) AS statsDate
, CONCAT(CONCAT(CONCAT(CONCAT(SUBSTR(OCCRRNC_DE, 1, 4), '-'), SUBSTR(OCCRRNC_DE, 5, 2)), '-'), SUBSTR(OCCRRNC_DE, 7, 2)) AS statsDate
FROM COMTSBBSSUMMARY WHERE 1 = 1
AND OCCRRNC_DE BETWEEN #fromDate# AND #toDate# AND STATS_SE = #statsKind#
AND DETAIL_STATS_SE = #detailStatsKind#
GROUP BY statsDate ORDER BY statsDate

SELECT a.OCCRRNC_DE AS statsDate , a.TOP_NTCR_ID AS topNtcepersonId , COUNT(b.NTT_ID) AS topNtcepersonCo FROM ( SELECT OCCRRNC_DE , TOP_NTCR_ID FROM COMTSBBSSUMMARY WHERE 1 = 1 AND OCCRRNC_DE BETWEEN #fromDate# AND #toDate# AND STATS_SE = #statsKind#
AND DETAIL_STATS_SE = #detailStatsKind#
) a, COMTNBBS b WHERE 1=1
AND a.TOP_NTCR_ID IS NOT NULL AND b.NTCR_ID = a.TOP_NTCR_ID
AND b.NTCR_ID IS NOT NULL GROUP BY statsDate, topNtcepersonId ORDER BY statsDate
SELECT a.STATS_SE AS statsKind FROM COMTSBBSSUMMARY a WHERE a.OCCRRNC_DE = DATE_FORMAT(ADDDATE(SYSDATE(), -1), '%Y%m%d') AND a.STATS_SE = #statsKind# AND a.DETAIL_STATS_SE = #detailStatsKind#

SELECT IFNULL(IFNULL(SUM(a.RDCNT),0) / COUNT(a.NTT_ID), 0) AS avrgInqireCo FROM COMTNBBS a, COMTNBBSMASTER b, COMTNTMPLATINFO c WHERE a.BBS_ID = b.BBS_ID AND DATE_FORMAT(a.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, '%Y%m%d') = DATE_FORMAT(ADDDATE(SYSDATE(), -1), '%Y%m%d') AND b.TMPLAT_ID = c.TMPLAT_ID AND c.TMPLAT_SE_CODE = #detailStatsKind#

SELECT a.NTT_ID AS mxmmInqireBbsId FROM COMTNBBS a, COMTNBBSMASTER b WHERE a.BBS_ID = b.BBS_ID AND a.RDCNT = (SELECT MAX(c.RDCNT) FROM COMTNBBS c, COMTNBBSMASTER d WHERE c.BBS_ID = d.BBS_ID AND c.RDCNT > 0 AND DATE_FORMAT(c.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM,'%Y%m%d') = DATE_FORMAT(ADDDATE(SYSDATE(), -1), '%Y%m%d') AND d.BBS_TY_CODE = #detailStatsKind#) AND DATE_FORMAT(a.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM,'%Y%m%d') = DATE_FORMAT(ADDDATE(SYSDATE(), -1), '%Y%m%d') AND b.BBS_TY_CODE = #detailStatsKind# LIMIT 1 OFFSET 1

SELECT a.NTT_ID AS mxmmInqireBbsId FROM COMTNBBS a, COMTNBBSMASTER b WHERE a.BBS_ID = b.BBS_ID AND a.RDCNT = (SELECT MAX(c.RDCNT) FROM COMTNBBS c, COMTNBBSMASTER d WHERE c.BBS_ID = d.BBS_ID AND c.RDCNT > 0 AND DATE_FORMAT(c.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM,'%Y%m%d') = DATE_FORMAT(ADDDATE(SYSDATE(), -1), '%Y%m%d') AND d.BBS_ATTRB_CODE = #detailStatsKind#) AND DATE_FORMAT(a.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM,'%Y%m%d') = DATE_FORMAT(ADDDATE(SYSDATE(), -1), '%Y%m%d') AND b.BBS_ATTRB_CODE = #detailStatsKind# LIMIT 1 OFFSET 1

SELECT a.NTT_ID AS mxmmInqireBbsId FROM COMTNBBS a, COMTNBBSMASTER b, COMTNTMPLATINFO c WHERE a.BBS_ID = b.BBS_ID AND a.RDCNT = (SELECT MAX(d.RDCNT) FROM COMTNBBS d, COMTNBBSMASTER e, COMTNTMPLATINFO f WHERE d.BBS_ID = e.BBS_ID AND d.RDCNT > 0 AND DATE_FORMAT(d.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM,'%Y%m%d') = DATE_FORMAT(ADDDATE(SYSDATE(), -1), '%Y%m%d') AND e.TMPLAT_ID = f.TMPLAT_ID AND f.TMPLAT_SE_CODE = #detailStatsKind#) AND DATE_FORMAT(a.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM,'%Y%m%d') = DATE_FORMAT(ADDDATE(SYSDATE(), -1), '%Y%m%d') AND b.TMPLAT_ID = c.TMPLAT_ID AND c.TMPLAT_SE_CODE = #detailStatsKind# LIMIT 1 OFFSET 1

SELECT a.NTT_ID AS mummInqireBbsId FROM COMTNBBS a, COMTNBBSMASTER b WHERE a.BBS_ID = b.BBS_ID AND a.RDCNT = (SELECT MIN(c.RDCNT) FROM COMTNBBS c, COMTNBBSMASTER d WHERE c.BBS_ID = d.BBS_ID AND c.RDCNT > 0 AND DATE_FORMAT(c.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM,'%Y%m%d') = DATE_FORMAT(ADDDATE(SYSDATE(), -1), '%Y%m%d') AND d.BBS_TY_CODE = #detailStatsKind#) AND DATE_FORMAT(a.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM,'%Y%m%d') = DATE_FORMAT(ADDDATE(SYSDATE(), -1), '%Y%m%d') AND b.BBS_TY_CODE = #detailStatsKind# LIMIT 1 OFFSET 1

SELECT a.NTT_ID AS mummInqireBbsId FROM COMTNBBS a, COMTNBBSMASTER b WHERE a.BBS_ID = b.BBS_ID AND a.RDCNT = (SELECT MIN(c.RDCNT) FROM COMTNBBS c, COMTNBBSMASTER d WHERE c.BBS_ID = d.BBS_ID AND c.RDCNT > 0 AND DATE_FORMAT(c.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM,'%Y%m%d') = DATE_FORMAT(ADDDATE(SYSDATE(), -1), '%Y%m%d') AND d.BBS_ATTRB_CODE = #detailStatsKind#) AND DATE_FORMAT(a.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM,'%Y%m%d') = DATE_FORMAT(ADDDATE(SYSDATE(), -1), '%Y%m%d') AND b.BBS_ATTRB_CODE = #detailStatsKind# LIMIT 1 OFFSET 1

SELECT a.NTT_ID AS mummInqireBbsId FROM COMTNBBS a, COMTNBBSMASTER b, COMTNTMPLATINFO c WHERE a.BBS_ID = b.BBS_ID AND a.RDCNT = (SELECT MIN(d.RDCNT) FROM COMTNBBS d, COMTNBBSMASTER e, COMTNTMPLATINFO f WHERE d.BBS_ID = e.BBS_ID AND d.RDCNT > 0 AND DATE_FORMAT(d.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM,'%Y%m%d') = DATE_FORMAT(ADDDATE(SYSDATE(), -1), '%Y%m%d') AND e.TMPLAT_ID = f.TMPLAT_ID AND f.TMPLAT_SE_CODE = #detailStatsKind#) AND DATE_FORMAT(a.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM,'%Y%m%d') = DATE_FORMAT(ADDDATE(SYSDATE(), -1), '%Y%m%d') AND b.TMPLAT_ID = c.TMPLAT_ID AND c.TMPLAT_SE_CODE = #detailStatsKind# LIMIT 1 OFFSET 1

SELECT (SELECT v.USER_ID FROM COMVNUSERMASTER v WHERE v.ESNTL_ID = c.topNtcepersonId) AS topNtcepersonId FROM (SELECT COUNT(a.NTT_ID) AS topNtcepersonCo , a.FRST_REGISTER_ID AS topNtcepersonId FROM COMTNBBS a, COMTNBBSMASTER b WHERE a.BBS_ID = b.BBS_ID AND a.FRST_REGISTER_ID IS NOT NULL AND DATE_FORMAT(a.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM,'%Y%m%d') = DATE_FORMAT(ADDDATE(SYSDATE(), -1), '%Y%m%d') AND b.BBS_TY_CODE = #detailStatsKind# GROUP BY a.FRST_REGISTER_ID) c WHERE c.topNtcepersonCo = (SELECT MAX(f.topNtcepersonCo) FROM (SELECT COUNT(d.NTT_ID) AS topNtcepersonCo , d.FRST_REGISTER_ID AS topNtcepersonId FROM COMTNBBS d, COMTNBBSMASTER e WHERE d.BBS_ID = e.BBS_ID AND d.FRST_REGISTER_ID IS NOT NULL AND DATE_FORMAT(d.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM,'%Y%m%d') = DATE_FORMAT(ADDDATE(SYSDATE(), -1), '%Y%m%d') AND e.BBS_TY_CODE = #detailStatsKind# GROUP BY d.FRST_REGISTER_ID) f) LIMIT 1 OFFSET 0

SELECT (SELECT v.USER_ID FROM COMVNUSERMASTER v WHERE v.ESNTL_ID = c.topNtcepersonId) AS topNtcepersonId FROM (SELECT COUNT(a.NTT_ID) AS topNtcepersonCo , a.FRST_REGISTER_ID AS topNtcepersonId FROM COMTNBBS a, COMTNBBSMASTER b WHERE a.BBS_ID = b.BBS_ID AND a.FRST_REGISTER_ID IS NOT NULL AND DATE_FORMAT(a.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM,'%Y%m%d') = DATE_FORMAT(ADDDATE(SYSDATE(), -1), '%Y%m%d') AND b.BBS_ATTRB_CODE = #detailStatsKind# GROUP BY a.FRST_REGISTER_ID) c WHERE c.topNtcepersonCo = (SELECT MAX(f.topNtcepersonCo) FROM (SELECT COUNT(d.NTT_ID) AS topNtcepersonCo , d.FRST_REGISTER_ID AS topNtcepersonId FROM COMTNBBS d, COMTNBBSMASTER e WHERE d.BBS_ID = e.BBS_ID AND d.FRST_REGISTER_ID IS NOT NULL AND DATE_FORMAT(d.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM,'%Y%m%d') = DATE_FORMAT(ADDDATE(SYSDATE(), -1), '%Y%m%d') AND e.BBS_ATTRB_CODE = #detailStatsKind# GROUP BY d.FRST_REGISTER_ID) f) LIMIT 1 OFFSET 0

SELECT (SELECT v.USER_ID FROM COMVNUSERMASTER v WHERE v.ESNTL_ID = c.topNtcepersonId) AS topNtcepersonId FROM (SELECT COUNT(a.NTT_ID) AS topNtcepersonCo , a.FRST_REGISTER_ID AS topNtcepersonId FROM COMTNBBS a, COMTNBBSMASTER b, COMTNTMPLATINFO t1 WHERE a.BBS_ID = b.BBS_ID AND a.FRST_REGISTER_ID IS NOT NULL AND DATE_FORMAT(a.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM,'%Y%m%d') = DATE_FORMAT(ADDDATE(SYSDATE(), -1), '%Y%m%d') AND b.TMPLAT_ID = t1.TMPLAT_ID AND t1.TMPLAT_SE_CODE = #detailStatsKind# GROUP BY a.FRST_REGISTER_ID) c WHERE c.topNtcepersonCo = (SELECT MAX(f.topNtcepersonCo) FROM (SELECT COUNT(d.NTT_ID) AS topNtcepersonCo , d.FRST_REGISTER_ID AS topNtcepersonId FROM COMTNBBS d, COMTNBBSMASTER e, COMTNTMPLATINFO t2 WHERE d.BBS_ID = e.BBS_ID AND d.FRST_REGISTER_ID IS NOT NULL AND DATE_FORMAT(d.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM,'%Y%m%d') = DATE_FORMAT(ADDDATE(SYSDATE(), -1), '%Y%m%d') AND e.TMPLAT_ID = t2.TMPLAT_ID AND t2.TMPLAT_SE_CODE = #detailStatsKind# GROUP BY d.FRST_REGISTER_ID) f) LIMIT 1 OFFSET 0

sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO COMTSBBSSUMMARY ( OCCRRNC_DE, STATS_SE, DETAIL_STATS_SE, CREAT_CO, TOT_RDCNT, AVRG_RDCNT, TOP_INQIRE_BBSCTT_ID, MUMM_INQIRE_BBSCTT_ID, TOP_NTCR_ID ) VALUES ( DATE_FORMAT(ADDDATE(SYSDATE(), -1), '%Y%m%d'), #statsKind#, #detailStatsKind#, #creatCo#, #totInqireCo#, #avrgInqireCo#, #mxmmInqireBbsId#, #mummInqireBbsId#, #topNtcepersonId# )
